job_history.work_description: Demonstrated experience in all aspect of the International aircraft validation / acceptance process from application submittal to granting of a validated type certificate. Lead subject matter expert on foreign regulations with regards to certification & operations. Managed external contract engineering design groups with regards Type Design changes. Developed and managed internal engineering disciplines, FAA, and foreign authority project teams during the validation process.

Developed and managed maintenance and avionic customer accounts, processed invoice payments, credits and net account billing. Prepared maintenance/avionics invoices. Managed subscription based navigational data for company charter operations & customer based aircraft. Coordinated invoicing, account management of all maintenance and avionics repairs for a FAA 145 repair station. Managed pilot supplies, purchase orders, inventory control cycling of life limited products.

skills.name: Aircraft Validation
skills.explanation: Demonstrated experience in all aspects of the International aircraft validation / acceptance process, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Regulatory Compliance
skills.explanation: Lead subject matter expert on foreign regulations with regards to certification & operations, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Managed external contract engineering design groups and internal engineering disciplines, FAA, and foreign authority project teams, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Team Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed and led teams during the validation process, suggesting strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Maintenance Management
skills.explanation: Developed and managed maintenance and avionic customer accounts, processed invoice payments, and coordinated invoicing, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Avionics Management
skills.explanation: Managed subscription-based navigational data for company charter operations & customer-based aircraft, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Inventory Control
skills.explanation: Managed pilot supplies, purchase orders, and inventory control cycling of life-limited products, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Account Management
skills.explanation: Processed invoice payments, credits, and net account billing, showing some practical experience in account management.

skills.name: Diving
skills.explanation: Mentioned as an interest, but no relevant experience or skills demonstrated.
